Christof, do you remember what refactoring you did ?

I think it was an Inline Method (from looking at the local history). I remember
stepping through the changes by pressing the (upper) down arrow button in the
preview dialog when I got an error message box and then found the exception in
the console.

The inlined method was a protected final getter which was called from multiple CUs.

I tried several scenarios with Inline method and wasn't able to reproduce. The 
assert fails if the region requested from a document is larger than the 
document itself, so nothing we can remove.

I can't reproduce this using I20040513. I will set the PR on remind. Christof, 
when you see this again please let me know.

Marking as dub of 72008 which contains reproducable steps.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 72008 ***
